title: 1.4.4 Data Processing, Analysis and Resource Mapping, Preparation
description: For organizing and analyzing the obtained data, computer software was designed and developed and tables were prepared as required, and MS Excel was also used for further analysis, while all types of obtained data were analyzed using MS Excel.
mappingDescription: For source map preparation as well, both methods were used, such as creating a GIS-based source map using software based on the GIS Database, and also using the method of mapping through Google Map by placing GIS Coordinates in the software developed for data management.
